reviews.sentence: Will return. Upon arrival I was told that my bokingcom reservation never made it into their system. After a 30 hour journey this was not what I wanted to hear. Luckily the receptionist was kind enough to give me the room since it was late at night and she told me not to worry and it would be sorted out in the morning. The staff continued to show their hospitality through their concierge service and the wait staff at the Terrace restaurant. My high heels needed repair and for less that 10USD the concierge arranged for the shoe maker to pick up fix and return to my room within hours. The waitress at dinner was very lovely and paid great attention to me. The best part of the hotel is that it is away from the busy streets with the most marvelous views of Seoul AND yet you still have easy access to the happenings with their free shuttle service. You really get the best of both worlds here. Will return here for future business trips.

Excellent facilities but not conveniently located. Beware that breakfast restaurant is currently undergoing renovation so on the weekend I waited for about 20 minutes to get a table. Sauna is also under renovation. The hotel has a nice lobby and staff offer excellent service but it is not conveniently located.

Rip Off brace yourself or rather your wallet. Only plusses are impressive lobby kind staff view. Small drab rooms. Unable to control temperature in the rooms. Some rooms updated with very slightly better double beds rarely a queen size. Absurd insanely high pricing for everything at this hotel mini bar beers 140 won whiskey 210 won. Cocktails in the lobby approaching 50. USD. Gym Staff informed me that although the gym was included in my rate I would have to pay 430 won extra to use the steam room. It seems they are out of touch with international ideas of what is included with a hotel room and what everything should cost especially in Korea. It feels like gouging. Unles you have an unlimited expense account avoid this pretentious over priced hotel. You deserve better.

Disappointment. After many years returned to the Grand Hyat but disappointed with the visit. During the day there was repairs in other rooms which caused a significant amount of noise. No one wants to hear work tools constantly during the morning hours while working in my room. But more importantly there was no forewarning of such repairs. A simple courtesy notice would have being appropriate.
One of the centers of Seoul. Keeps renewing and renovating itself. This hotel matters.

Very ordinary property in need of a renovation. Stayed here for a business conference. Facilities are very run down and in need of repair. My room fixtures were shabby and had suffered through years of use with no attention or updating evident. Location is remote and difficult to get to anywhere by walking. Food in the restaurants and through the conference venues was poor as well. This place trades on the Grand Hyat brand but is a tired old lady that is in desperate need of a renovation. Avoid this place if you can.
Worthy and comfortable. Nice location with great view. it is nice to take 30 60 mins morning walk around the hotel you will love it. It would be good to update the diversity for the breakfast.

Hotel under renovation. Stayed at the Grand Hyat Seoul which is located in Namsan. Nice hotel with great rooms. If you stay here during winter there is an ice skating ring to use but it is pricey. The hotel is undergoing renovation at the moment and there is no air conditioning in the room. We had to request for 2 fans to cool the room down. Otherwise a great hotel to stay.

Renovation. Unfortunately there was renovation work in the upper floors not pre announced. that limited my sleep significantly. The receptionists remark that they do only work daytime does n’t help when you come from overseas and need some sleep.

A beautiful and charming hotel. My wife and I stayed at the Grand Hyat Seoul as part of our wedding anniversary trip to Korea and this is definitely the best of the 3 hotels we stayed in. It ’s a beautiful hotel luxuriously appointed and with lots of historical charm. The hotel is undergoing renovations when we were there and we do see the need to upgrade some of the technology niceties like TVs USB charging points etc. We stayed in the Grand Suite with a beautiful view of the river and last but not least we experienced excellent service from the hotel staff during check in concierge Terrace restaurant Grand Club and check out. Thanks Hyat.

A nice renovation. The renovation of the rooms at Grand Hyat Seoul has been quite well done. Structure of the great former interior design has been kept and new additions make the room comfortable and good looking. The biggest improvement is the bathroom which looks now very elegant and open though being small for a hotel of that category. Food at the Club Lounge was very nice not a huge choice but all of good quality. For many clients the main frustration would come from the pool and the sauna. If the pool looks great there are far not enough sun beds around it for a hotel that big. The reason is that a big business is done with the pool restaurant and tables are preferred to sun beds for the clients. it is very early 6 pm closing time confirms it. During summer the rule is that you can access the pool only once during your all stay that is insane and will prevent me to book again during that period. But again it is understandable considering that restaurant seems a priority there. Last noticeable thing is that the access at the sauna is charged if you are not booked into a Club room this is totally unfair. So the hotel is very peasant and comfortable but some rules might prevent me to book there again.

Stunning view paired with excellence. An exceptional hotel in every possible way. Dedicated friendly and well informed staff beautiful and mostly renovated rooms excellent food and a stunning view over Seoul. Namsan Park is on the doorstep of the hotel and just a short walk downhill is the famous party district. It is not centrally located or anywhere close to shopping but the location is unique. The Club Lounge is well appointed.

Beautiful facilities conveniently located room details could be updated and improved. Overall a great stay. I would hesitate to give it a 5 star hotel rating as I have stayed at 5 stars and Grand Hyat in Seoul is not quite at that level. Maybe it used to be when it was a brand new facility but in its current state it is a little dated. Could use a general facility revamp. Staff is great.

Good maintenance even during renovation. Although renovation is going on it is still good to stay. Otherwise I would give five stars for room quality. There was some paint glue smell at corridor. And the restroom at lobby was closed for construction.

Best view Amazing staff. we have stayed in this location a couple of times during the past few years. It is relatively easy to get to from the airport to the hotel. After going through renovations the hotel feels more grand and glamorous than before. During our very last visit in Seoul we tried to stay a night in the Park Hyat and were hugely disappointed with the small rooms and mediocre staff What can I say we were too pampered in the Grand Hyat. What makes Grand Hyat Seoul special is how sincere and friendly the staff are. Want to give a shout out to Heidi Chung in the club lounge who always greeted us with a big smile and actively resolve any issues we have. We can not wait for our next visit.
generally good place to stay and restaurants need renovation badly.

A good stay as usual. Stayed in the renovated room and noticed the addition of Korean elements like the light grey tiles in the bathroom which differentiates the rooms from other Hyat hotels. I particularly like the gym. Excellent quality gym equipment to ‘ entertain ’ all the muscle or rather fat groups. Also appreciate the hourly shuttle bus service to Itaewon and Myeongdong MRT stations.

Memorable. I stayed for one night at the Grand Hyat Seoul and did a day long seminar there the next day. My room on the renovated 14th floor was great but it was the seminar facilities that were truly memorable. The seminar was held in the Sanso room on the lower level. The decor seating lighting and A V equipment were perfect but what grabbed my attention was how at lunchtime the screen I used for my presentation magically disappeared to reveal a separate room for lunch. And lunch was extraordinary. The hotel staff was discreet and efficient. When I left I particularly appreciated the attentive manner in which David secured a taxi for me and made sure the driver knew where to take me. Overall thanks in no small part to the hotel it was a highlight of my 14 years of doing seminars around the world.
Good to stay in Seoul. Room is clean and renew. 24 hrs gym very good view of Seoul city and Nansan mountain. Breakfast is excellent and delicious.

One of my favourite Grand Hyat ’s in Asia with its consistency in quality service throughout your entire stay. Rooms have been renovated so they are all well appointed and I ’ve never had any issue with noise. Breakfast selection in the main restaurant is great with both local regional and western offerings. Gym facilities are very good with a large variety of machines cardio as well as some free weights Smith machine and cable machine. The only negative is that some of the better equipment is located in a separate room that can only be used with a personal trainer squat rack. I ’d highly recommend the Spa they have a great number of options and it has always been a very pleasant experience with the staff being excellent. Overall highly recommend.
